Package com.kohlschutter.stringhold.liqp

Class StringholdLiqpHelper

java.lang.Object
com.kohlschutter.stringhold.liqp.StringholdLiqpHelper
public final class StringholdLiqpHelper extends Object
Some helper methods that can be useful when working with Liqp.
Author:
Christian Kohlschütter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static liqp.TemplateParser.Builder
    configure(liqp.TemplateParser.Builder builder)
    Configures the given TemplateParser.Builder, adding Conditionally and Conditional, as well as using the StringHolderRenderTransformer available through StringHolderRenderTransformer.getSharedCacheInstance()..
    static liqp.TemplateParser
    newConfiguredTemplateParser()
    Creates a new TemplateParser, configured via configure(Builder).
    static liqp.TemplateParser
    newConfiguredTemplateParser(Function<liqp.TemplateParser.Builder,liqp.TemplateParser.Builder> additionalConfiguration)
    Creates a new TemplateParser, configured via configure(Builder), adding additional configuration as specified.

  • Method Details

    • configure

      public static liqp.TemplateParser.Builder configure(liqp.TemplateParser.Builder builder)
      Configures the given TemplateParser.Builder, adding Conditionally and Conditional, as well as using the StringHolderRenderTransformer available through StringHolderRenderTransformer.getSharedCacheInstance()..
      Parameters:
      builder - The builder to configure.
      Returns:
      The builder.

    • newConfiguredTemplateParser

      public static liqp.TemplateParser newConfiguredTemplateParser()
      Creates a new TemplateParser, configured via configure(Builder).
      Returns:
      The configured TemplateParser.

    • newConfiguredTemplateParser

      public static liqp.TemplateParser newConfiguredTemplateParser(Function<liqp.TemplateParser.Builder,liqp.TemplateParser.Builder> additionalConfiguration)
      Creates a new TemplateParser, configured via configure(Builder), adding additional configuration as specified.
      Parameters:
      additionalConfiguration - The additional configuration.
      Returns:
      The new template parser.
